channel.title: I know how to add new armor, but I don't know how to add something else
channel.description: Hey guys! :D I know that for every armor piece, I have to go to item.java and paste the number next to the sort (ex: bronze platelegs go to: legs) but I don't find any sort called: 'weapon' or 'bow' or 'sword'. what do I do? (317 Renegadepkz source and client)

item.title: I know how to add new armor, but I don't know how to add something else
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

You don’t find one for “weapon” because any item that utilizes the Equip item packet will go into the weapon slot by default.
I assume your server is some derivative of a PI source… which means you will find an array for bows/arrows in one of the following files:
CombatAssisstant
Config
Player
ItemAssistant
Item
[hr]
It’ll probably have a literal name like “BOWS” or etc…
for 2 handed, look for “2h” or similar… in the same files.

Read full topic
item.source: I know how to add new armor, but I don't know how to add something else
